thread.title: BRIEF-‍Cubic Transportation And John Laing Reach Financial Close and Executed Agreement With MBTA

title: BRIEF-‍Cubic Transportation And John Laing Reach Financial Close and Executed Agreement With MBTA
text: March 21, 2018 / 11:26 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-‍Cubic Transportation And John Laing Reach Financial Close and Executed Agreement With MBTA Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Cubic Corp: * CUBIC | JOHN LAING CONSORTIUM CLOSES FINANCING WITH MASSACHUSETTS BAY TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY​ (MBTA) FOR NEXT-GENERATION FARE PAYMENT SYSTEM * CUBIC CORP - ‍CUBIC TRANSPORTATION SYSTEMS AND JOHN LAING REACHED FINANCIAL CLOSE & EXECUTED AGREEMENT WITH MASSACHUSETTS BAY TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY​ * CUBIC CORP - ‍PUBLIC PRIVATE PARTNERSHIP INCLUDES IMPLEMENTATION AND OPERATION OF A NEW FARE PAYMENT SYSTEM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
